Meteara nods and walks into the ship.

Meteara: Yes, we shall go now. I will embark with you and your 
cybertronian copanion because I sense someone is here for me. After 
securing the master sphere, we can start to establish a balance.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Firaxis::
>        He nods solemnly and keys a few commands into a keypad on his 
arm to 
> activate the ships autopilot.  It approaches the area around the 
sphere 
> setting off an alarm.  "Oops.  I forgot to give the ship clearance 
to be here 
> ... oh well, it's probably better this way in case it ever gets 
stolen."  He 
> gestures to his ship.  "Shall we depart?"
